documents.title: Cloudora HR Overview
documents.content: Cloudora HR policies ensure a professional, respectful, and productive work environment. Employees must follow attendance, communication rules, behaviour standards, and confidentiality guidelines.

documents.title: Attendance & Work Discipline
documents.content: Employees must follow shift timing, complete daily tasks, update CRM, attend meetings, and communicate delays. Uninformed absences are not allowed.

documents.title: Communication Policy
documents.content: Communication with customers and colleagues must be polite, structured, professional and on-time. Genie helps with message formatting and tone improvement.

documents.title: Behaviour & Culture Policy
documents.content: Cloudora promotes respect, teamwork, accountability and positivity. Bullying, anger, disrespectful behaviour or argument-based communication is not allowed.

documents.title: Confidentiality Policy
documents.content: Employees must protect customer data, internal documents, pricing sheets and workflow processes. Genie will not reveal restricted information to any employee without access.

documents.title: Performance Expectations
documents.content: Employees are expected to meet weekly and monthly targets, maintain quality work, improve skills and follow workflows. Genie provides support for performance improvement.
